name: OpenBookQA
summary:
_âš  Use card with caution_
A multiple-choice QA dataset of elementary science questions requiring reasoning with core science facts and common knowledge.
size: 5,957 questions (4,957 train, 500 dev, 500 test); each with 4 answer choices.
notes: Includes an 'open book' of 1,326 science facts from elementary textbooks. Answering requires combining these facts with additional commonsense knowledge, testing multi-hop reasoning. Part of the ARC/OpenBookQA leaderboard challenges.
